name: Billionaire CEO
description:
Your factory’s conveyor belt is on the fritz and there’s only one man powerful enough to keep the deliveries on schedule – you! In this dynamic endless runner, it’s your job to take charge and kick off all your customer’s packages while dodging pylons, barriers, and items from disgruntled employees. You can even fill up your rocket meter for an out-of-this-world surprise. Are you a mighty enough CEO to handle this job on your own?

This game includes:
- Game center leaderboards
- Dynamic environment
- 2 Bosses
